item.title: Learning Japanese with data.table and ggplot2
item.description: .hljs{ background: #a7a7a71a; font-size: 90%; } .imgshow { display: none; } This post is about drawing hiragana and katakana tables using R, data.table, and ggplot2. The objective was to better illustrate the rules that underlie these two Japanese writing systems. Overview of the the Japanese writing systems For a more detailed and accurate information, Wikipedia articles are excellent and have been used as a source for this article.
